original_text: “Speak to all the congregation of the people of Israel and say to them, You shall be holy, for I the Lord your God am holy.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 말하여 이르라 너희는 거룩하라 이는 나 여호와 너희 하나님이 거룩함이니라

sentences.original_text: Speak to all the congregation of the people of Israel
for I the Lord your God am holy.
